Insurance Savings Family Hospitalisation Insurance (H&S) Healthcare Health Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 03 Jun 2019Should i continue with my AIA pink of health policy? This policy entitles you to daily allowance if you're hospitalized. I want to save on premium. Should i still continue with it?

Premium $150/year. The allowance they give ranges from $50-$100I cancelled and got scolded by my parents3 answersAnswerBump2
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

EEugeneLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 06 Jun 2019Well what you can do now is to do a policy review to reassess your current financial status. Having to save on premium might mean that you're spending too much on other stuff? If you're interested I can intro you my agent l. He's done a pretty good job so far. Not too pushy either.0 comments0

Benjamin TanLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 04 Jun 2019It is a dated policy. AIA shield plans provides daily cash for hospitalization stay. Maybe consider using the funds to upgrade your current policy(if possible) or consider other polices to supplement your coverage.0 comments0

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 03 Jun 2019Yeah it's really an affordable policy but it's not a necessity, more of a good to have.For hospital income, your shield plan rider may have that benefit and if you a PA plan, it may include that as well. So it's up to you. If I can afford it, I'll just keep it as an in case. It may help pay for some misc expenses.0 comments0
